title: Handle a Rider No-Show
description: A driver arrives at a pickup location and the rider never shows up. The driver needs to cancel the trip and receive a cancellation fee.

tasks.description: The driver app shows they have arrived at the pickup location and a timer starts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system logs the driver's arrival at the correct location.

tasks.description: The driver attempts to contact the rider via the app but gets no response.
After the timer expires (e.g., 5 minutes), the option to cancel the trip becomes available.
tasks.expected_outcome: The app allows the driver to cancel.

tasks.description: The driver cancels the trip, and the system automatically charges the rider a no-show fee and compensates the driver.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trip is cancelled, and the fee is processed correctly.
